categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens actors

nodes.text: Cailey Fleming (born March 25, 2007) is an American actress who played young Rey in the 2015 film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. Her scene was filmed at the headquarters of Bad Robot Productions in Burbank, California. She is also known for playing Sorrow in the second season of the comedy-drama series Better Things and playing Judith Grimes in the ninth season of The Walking Dead.
